output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Presence: - Yes, contains CMF 11240015, which indicates it's electoral propaganda
2. Candidate Reference: - Directly mentions "Elena Lasconi", a confirmed presidential candidate - References USR's proposals and Lasconi's plan
3. Wide Population Address: - This is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Discusses broad economic policies affecting entrepreneurs and PFAs - Has received significant impressions (8,000-8,999)
4. Electoral Objective: - Clearly presents campaign promises and political platform - Aims to promote Elena Lasconi's presidential campaign - Presents specific policy proposals to attract voters
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalistic content - It's a clear campaign message promoting specific political promises - Contains party proposals and candidate's platform
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an official party communication - Contains structured policy proposals - Includes official CMF number
The post was created and active after the end of the presidential campaign period, continuing electoral propaganda when it should have ceased.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate's platform - Makes specific campaign promises - Is a paid advertisement reaching large audiences - Continues after the legal campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: USR Caraș-Severin, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei, promovând programul electoral al candidatei Elena Lasconi prin intermediul unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID: 1247985159866179). Postarea conține promisiuni electorale specifice privind reducerea taxelor pentru antreprenori și PFA-uri, fiind marcată cu cod CMF 11240015, și a fost difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale. Impactul postării este semnificativ, atingând între 8.000 și 8.999 de persoane, cu un buget de promovare între 200-299 RON.
